name: Brick Block Temple
description:
CONTROLS:

Move: WASD or ARROW KEYS

Swing Hammer: SPACE

Reset Level: R 

This game was created for the 2022 LOWREZJAM, I really enjoyed taking part and I hope you like what I made

SIDE NOTE: The main menu I had designed LITERALLY BROKE THE GAME so I had to push it with no start menu to meet the deadline, I will likely add one that works properly in the future!
